name: Elevated Push-Ups
description: Put your hands on an elevated platform and your feet on the floor.

name: Bench Dips
description: Hold yourself on an elevated platform with your hands slightly behind your back and perform dips by slowly lowering yourself until your buttocks almost hit the floor

name: Decline Push-Ups
description: Put your feet on an elevated platform and your hands on the floor

name: Calf Raises
description: Stand on an elevated platform with the front of your feet
